Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb24retrieve.name: retrieveAvailableDevices(completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb24retrieve.abstract: Scans for and retrieves a collection of available Zorb devices.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb7connectyy.name: connect(completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb7connectyy.abstract: Initiates a connection to an advertising Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb10disconne.name: disconnect()
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb10disconne.abstract: Ends connection to a connected Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb5resetyy0A.name: reset(completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb5resetyy0A.abstract: Writes the appropriate command to reset connected Zorb device’s Javascript virtual machine.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb14writeAct.name: writeActuators(duration:topLeft:topRight:bottomLeft:bottomRight:completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb14writeAct.abstract: Writes desired actuator data to Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb15writeJav.name: writeJavascript(_:completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb15writeJav.abstract: Writes a given string of Javascript to the connected Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb15writeJav.name: writeJavascript(at:completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb15writeJav.abstract: Writes the Javascript code at a given URL to the connected Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb19writeByt.name: writeBytecodeString(_:completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb19writeByt.abstract: Writes a given string of base64 encoded bytecode to the connected Zorb device.

Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb14triggerP.name: triggerPattern(_:completion:)
Functions.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb14triggerP.abstract: Triggers a given pre-loaded pattern on the connected Zorb device.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: connect(completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Called to initiate connection with a given zorb device

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: disconnect()
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Called to end connection with a given zorb device

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: reset(completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Writes the appropriate command to reset given device’s Javascript virtual machine.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: readVersion(completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Obtains the current revision version of the firmware on the device

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: readSerial(completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Obtains the current serial number of the paired device

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: writeActuators(duration:topLeft:topRight:bottomLeft:bottomRight:completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Writes desired actuator data to given device.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: writeJavascript(_:completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Writes a given string of Javascript to the given device.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: writeJavascript(at:completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Writes the Javascript code at a given URL to the given device.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: writeBytecodeString(_:completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Writes a given string of base64 encoded bytecode to the given device.

Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.name: triggerPattern(_:completion:)
Classes/ZorbDevice.html#/s:10SwiftyZorb0.abstract: Triggers a given pre-loaded pattern on the given device

Classes/ZorbDevice.html.name: ZorbDevice
Classes/ZorbDevice.html.abstract: Class encapsulating the all necessary functions for a given device peripheral
